audioText: Le sage soldat continuera son histoire digne demain pendant notre rendez-vous.
question: Le ______ soldat continuera son histoire digne demain pendant notre rendez-vous.
explanation: The text states 'Le sage soldat continuera son histoire digne demain pendant notre rendez-vous' - The wise soldier will continue his worthy story tomorrow during our appointment. This combines 'sage', 'soldat', 'continuera', 'digne', and 'rendez-vous' in natural conversation.
